targetAudience: Knowledge workers, remote professionals, productivity enthusiasts 25-45

brief.executiveSummary: FocusFlow AI is an AI-powered productivity tool that helps knowledge workers manage tasks, prioritize work, and stay focused. It uses AI to auto-schedule tasks, summarize meetings, and suggest optimal work blocks.
messagePillars: AI auto-schedules your day for peak productivity
Meeting summaries and action items in seconds
Smart task prioritization based on deadlines and energy levels
Works with Google Calendar, Slack, and 100+ integrations
brief.valueProposition: The AI productivity assistant that actually saves you time â€” auto-schedule, summarize, and focus.

audience.primary: Remote knowledge workers 25-45 who juggle multiple projects and tools
